help.short: The name of targeted Nginx deployment

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of targeted NGINX deployment
The name of the targeted NGINX deployment
help.lines: It should contain only alphanumeric characters, up to 30 characters long; and cannot begin or end with a hyphen.

help.short: Managed identity to perform operations on Azure key vault or storage account
help.lines: '{"type":"UserAssigned","userAssignedIdentities":{"/subscriptions/subscriptionId/resourcegroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/myUserAssigneMI":{}}}' SystemAssigned UserAssigned certificate contributor resources. --identity necessary identity identity logging, managed access, managed storage account accepts should access should access vault. should Usage: values roles Azure Azure role. have have cert read have blob Type enum that The the For the key For on on it is an or

help.short: Type of managed identity to use
The billing information for the resource
Name of the SKU.
Tags for deployment.

argGroup.name: Properties

help.short: Autoupgrade settings of a deployment. can be stable or preview
Channel used for autoupgrade.
Boolean to enable/disable diagnostics support

argGroup.arg: <help short="To have logs sent to your storage account. Must specify managed identity with blob contributor role on Azure storage account" lines="Usage: --logging storage-account='{"account-name":"", "container-name":}'"/>

help.short: The managed resource group to deploy VNet injection related network resources.

argGroup.arg:
<help short="IP address and VNet + subnet information" lines="network-interface-configuration="<subnet front-end-ip-configuration="" information>" information, addresses. delegated network. address private virtual Usage: public public subnet within subnet should your This or IP IP or IP be to A"/>
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.networkProfile.frontEndIPConfiguration.privateIPAddresses" options="private-ip-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.networkProfile.frontEndIPConfiguration.publicIPAddresses" options="public-ip-addresses">

<help short="Scaling for NGINX capacity units (NCUs)" lines="https://docs.nginx.com/nginxaas/azure/billing/overview/ --scaling-properties capacity= more For"/> <arg type="array" var="$body.properties.scalingProperties.autoScaleSettings.profiles" options="profiles" group="AutoScaleSettings">

help.short: Optional: Preferred communication email
The preferred support contact email address of the user used for sending alerts and notification. Can be an empty string or a valid email address.

help.short: The billing information for the resource
Name of the SKU.
Tags for deployment.

argGroup.name: Properties

help.short: Autoupgrade settings of a deployment.
Channel used for autoupgrade.
Boolean to enable/disable diagnostics support

argGroup.arg: <help short="To have logs sent to your storage account. Must specify managed identity with blob contributor role on Azure storage account" lines="Usage: --logging storage-account='{"account-name":"", "container-name":}'"/>

help.short: The managed resource group to deploy VNet injection related network resources.

argGroup.arg:
<help short="IP address and VNet + subnet information" lines="network-interface-configuration="<subnet front-end-ip-configuration="" information>" information, addresses. delegated network. address private virtual Usage: public public subnet within subnet should your This or IP IP or IP be to A"/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$body.properties.networkProfile.frontEndIPConfiguration.privateIPAddresses" options="private-ip-addresses">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$body.properties.networkProfile.frontEndIPConfiguration.publicIPAddresses" options="public-ip-addresses">

<help short="Scaling for NGINX capacity units (NCUs)" lines="https://docs.nginx.com/nginxaas/azure/billing/overview/ --scaling-properties capacity= more For"/> <arg type="array" var="$body.properties.scalingProperties.autoScaleSettings.profiles" options="profiles" group="AutoScaleSettings">

help.short: Optional: Preferred communication email
The preferred support contact email address of the user used for sending alerts and notification. Can be an empty string or a valid email address.
